message.body: Hey Steve. Happy new year. Can we try to game plan getting those laser cuts completed? Do you want me to pick up some thicker paper? I think we should just do them at 18" tall so it will most likely work.
Yes I've been crazy busy sorry for falling off the radar … I still feel I need to try and cut them at PhillyU let me call you in a bit…
No problem. I'm in no real rush, but I just want it to actually happen at some point. Let me know how it goes
